Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Tytree>……オレには、 親友と思える相手はいなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Tytree>... I've never had someone I'd considered to be my best friend...

Entry.JapaneseText: らしくないぜ、<Veigue>！ 急にそんな事言ってよ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's not like you to say something like that out of nowhere, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、最高に嬉しいぜ！ おれもそう思ってたんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: But, hearing that makes me super happy! I was thinking the same thing!

Entry.JapaneseText: おいおい、まるで、今から 死ぬみてえじゃねーかよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey now, you're sounding like we're going to die or something!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな時はこう言うもんだぜ…… これからも、よろしく！ ってな。
Entry.EnglishText: Now's the sort of time where you should be saying something like, "Let's be friends forever!" Y'know?
Entry.Notes: これからも、よろしく I love these phrases
